param.name: CertificateSize
param.para: The size of the pCertificate array, in bytes. To get the size of the certificate chain, call .

param.name: pCertificate
param.para: A pointer to a byte array that receives the driver's certificate chain. The caller must allocate the array.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Gets the size of the driver's certificate chain.

param.name: pCertificateSize
param.para: Receives the size of the certificate chain, in bytes.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Gets a handle to the authenticated channel.

param.name: pChannelHandle
param.para: Receives a handle to the channel.

summary.para: Provides a communication channel with the graphics driver or the Microsoft Direct3D runtime.

remarks.para: To get a pointer to this interface, call .
